name: Nicholas A. BORSELLO, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Borsello v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: Nicholas A. BORSELLO, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of August, 2004, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
857 A.2d 673
Nicholas A. BORSELLO, Jr., Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION & PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 6, 2004.
